desc:
"You & You're Girlfriend went to buy a house from a mouse called 'jerry', and the offered house seemed to be pretty good for your living, so it was decided to be bought, until you've fallen downstairs to get into a basement, you've found the dead body of an old friend of jerry called 'tom', and the secrets of the mouse has been uncovered, but he wouldn't let you escape.


But surely you'll do."
